@martinwicke @yifeif

(Sorry for my misunderstanding about your hacking autopep8 before this edition of this comment.)

If the TF uses 2 space indent, which is a special case for most of the Python developers, please add a comment line at the beginning of all the files for vim users.

Like this,

#!/usr/bin/env python
# vim: tabstop=2 shiftwidth=2 softtabstop=2

Why? Please see: https://wiki.python.org/moin/Vim

Indentaion is very important for Python scripts as we all known.
Tell it explicitly in code.
